name: PlayerPref Practice
description:
For this class assignment, we had to use PlayerPrefs to save our game. PlayerPrefs allow you to store information in the game such as a save state.

For a time, I have always wanted to know how to save my game and this project taught me how. Through UI, I was able to save a unique name that I typed in the textbox. 

With this new knowledge I can apply it to my own games and give players the option to save their games as they progress.
